Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 29/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
